pages.text: Sophogramma is a genus of kalligrammatid lacewing described from multiple sites in Cretaceous, such as Yixian Formation, Early Cretaceous of Liaoning, China. Unlike other kalligrammatids, Sophogramma had mandibulate mouthparts.
